name: AIDS.gov
summary: The HIV Testing Sites & Care Services Locator is a first-of-its-kind, location-based search tool that allows you to search for testing services, housing providers, health centers and other service providers near your current location.nAIDS.gov has developed two different layouts for the AIDS.gov locator widget. In order to allow users the flexibility to place this widget conveniently within th
details: The HIV Testing Sites & Care Services Locator is a first-of-its-kind, location-based search tool that allows you to search for testing services, housing providers, health centers and other service providers near your current location.nAIDS.gov has developed two different layouts for the AIDS.gov locator widget. In order to allow users the flexibility to place this widget conveniently within their site, there is a horizontal version and a vertical version. Each widget functions identically, so there is no difference between the two other than aesthetics. Please reference the items below, including embed codes and specific descriptions of each widget and feel free to place on your site.

name: Allscripts
summary: Allscripts Healthcare Solutions, Inc. (MDRX-NASDAQ) is a publicly traded American company that provides physician practices, hospitals, and other healthcare providers with practice management and electronic health record technology. Allscripts also provides solutions for patient engagement and care coordination, as well as financial and analytics technology. The company has more than 180,000 physi
details: Allscripts Healthcare Solutions, Inc. (MDRX-NASDAQ) is a publicly traded American company that provides physician practices, hospitals, and other healthcare providers with practice management and electronic health record technology. Allscripts also provides solutions for patient engagement and care coordination, as well as financial and analytics technology. The company has more than 180,000 physician users and has solutions in 2,700 hospitals and 13,000 extended care organizations.

name: Antoine Lavoisier
summary: HIPAASpace is an online service, providing a set of tools, including the validation of HIPAA EDI documents for conformance to Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA) regulations, NPI number validation, NPI registry lookup, and many more HIPAA-related services.
details: HIPAASpace is an online service, providing a set of tools, including the validation of HIPAA EDI documents for conformance to Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA) regulations, NPI number validation, NPI registry lookup, and many more HIPAA-related services.

name: AT&T Dev Program
summary: AT&T Developer Program is the API platform for all AT&T devices and the AT&T network. AT&T provides device, call, location, messaging, speech, notifications, payments as well as advertising and healthcare solutions across multiple devices and mobile operating systems.
details: AT&T Developer Program is the API platform for all AT&T devices and the AT&T network. AT&T provides device, call, location, messaging, speech, notifications, payments as well as advertising and healthcare solutions across multiple devices and mobile operating systems.

name: BaseHealth
summary: We power evidence-based assessments and detailed action plans spanning each individual’s unique activity, diet, environmental and lifestyle needs. The result is engaging, sustained population health.
details: We power evidence-based assessments and detailed action plans spanning each individual’s unique activity, diet, environmental and lifestyle needs. The result is engaging, sustained population health.

name: Catalyze
summary: Catalyze exists to help healthcare transition to value-based patient care. We aid the innovators by enabling them to focus on their innovation, not compliance or integration. Catalyze is built by healthcare and security veterans with a deep understanding to what it takes to make you successful. We arenu2019t healthcare-friendly, we are healthcare-only. Catalyze raises the value of digital health d
details: Catalyze exists to help healthcare transition to value-based patient care. We aid the innovators by enabling them to focus on their innovation, not compliance or integration. Catalyze is built by healthcare and security veterans with a deep understanding to what it takes to make you successful. We arenu2019t healthcare-friendly, we are healthcare-only. Catalyze raises the value of digital health data and applications by making them secure, trustworthy, and interoperable with other health systems. We align and amplify your model.

name: Doctoralia
summary: The worlds biggest health professionals database with more than 2.3 million professionals and health centers. Search by location, insurance, specialty or keywords. Results are returned by geolocation or relevance. Users can book an appointment with a doctor through your website or app without any cost to you or the patient with full addresses, phone numbers, insurance info, specialties and ratings
details: The worlds biggest health professionals database with more than 2.3 million professionals and health centers. Search by location, insurance, specialty or keywords. Results are returned by geolocation or relevance. Users can book an appointment with a doctor through your website or app without any cost to you or the patient with full addresses, phone numbers, insurance info, specialties and ratings. All content is being constantly updated by Doctoralia.

name: dossia
summary: Dossia Application Programming Interface - The Dossia API allows client applications to securely read and update a Dossia participants health data. Developers can read and write medications, allergies, immunizations and other XML document types.
details: Dossia Application Programming Interface - The Dossia API allows client applications to securely read and update a Dossia participants health data. Developers can read and write medications, allergies, immunizations and other XML document types.

name: Doximity
summary: Doximity connects physicians to make them more successful and productive. With over 40% of U.S. physicians as members, collaborating across every specialty and academic medical center, Doximity is the largest HIPAA-secure medical network in the country. In a system increasingly run by executives, Doximity takes care of the people that take care of us.
details: Doximity connects physicians to make them more successful and productive. With over 40% of U.S. physicians as members, collaborating across every specialty and academic medical center, Doximity is the largest HIPAA-secure medical network in the country. In a system increasingly run by executives, Doximity takes care of the people that take care of us.

name: EhrScape
summary: Health app development shouldnt be harder than other verticals. EhrScape is all about making awesome healthcare apps easy to build and integrate into your environment. Healthcare computing that just works. EhrScape handles all the hard bits, including detailed clinical models, semantic interoperability, vendor independent data storage, health data query and more. Our mission is to empower you to b
details: Health app development shouldnt be harder than other verticals. EhrScape is all about making awesome healthcare apps easy to build and integrate into your environment. Healthcare computing that just works. EhrScape handles all the hard bits, including detailed clinical models, semantic interoperability, vendor independent data storage, health data query and more. Our mission is to empower you to build amazing healthcare apps and services. Welcome aboard. Were just getting started and weve got very big plans!

name: eligible
summary: The Eligible Health Insurance API is a service that lets users lookup information on over 700 insurance companies. Information available includes patients active versus inactive status, coinsurance, copayment, deductible, health spending balance and specialty specific information such as MRI and diagnostic labs. The API uses RESTful calls and responses are formatted in JSON.
details: The Eligible Health Insurance API is a service that lets users lookup information on over 700 insurance companies. Information available includes patients active versus inactive status, coinsurance, copayment, deductible, health spending balance and specialty specific information such as MRI and diagnostic labs. The API uses RESTful calls and responses are formatted in JSON.

name: healthfinder.gov
summary: In an ongoing effort to implement the Federal Digital Strategy, healthfinder.gov is connecting Web site editors and developers with the tools they need to host and share the Government’s reliable health and wellness information.nAll healthfinder.gov APIs are available to output English and Spanish content. To begin using a healthfinder.gov API, please register using the form to the right. A
details: In an ongoing effort to implement the Federal Digital Strategy, healthfinder.gov is connecting Web site editors and developers with the tools they need to host and share the Government’s reliable health and wellness information.nAll healthfinder.gov APIs are available to output English and Spanish content. To begin using a healthfinder.gov API, please register using the form to the right. A confirmation that includes your unique API key will be sent to your email address. Please save the email for future reference.

name: Healthnotes
summary: Healthnotes is the industry-leading natural health database used by household names like Walmart, GNC, and Whole Foods to deliver self-care health tips and recommendations to their shoppers.nHealthnotes is the industry-leading content source for consumer self-care wellness decisions. Through the API you will find access to this consumer-oriented content and the powerful contextual data connections
details: Healthnotes is the industry-leading natural health database used by household names like Walmart, GNC, and Whole Foods to deliver self-care health tips and recommendations to their shoppers.nHealthnotes is the industry-leading content source for consumer self-care wellness decisions. Through the API you will find access to this consumer-oriented content and the powerful contextual data connections that allow for sophisticated integrations personalized to your users needs.

name: HealthTap
summary: At HealthTap, we believe that the way to improve health care is through innovation and teamwork. Our APIs grant access to HealthTaps powerful wealth of knowledge and reputation data, an ever-expanding bank of high-quality content created by thousands of U.S.-licensed physicians every day. Connect with us to power your apps with the worlds first Interactive Health engine.
details: At HealthTap, we believe that the way to improve health care is through innovation and teamwork. Our APIs grant access to HealthTaps powerful wealth of knowledge and reputation data, an ever-expanding bank of high-quality content created by thousands of U.S.-licensed physicians every day. Connect with us to power your apps with the worlds first Interactive Health engine.

name: Human API
summary: Human API can turn disparate health data compiled from dozens of sensors and data sources into a meaningful story of a user’s health, in real time. The HumanAPI is an API platform for all human health data. We aggregate, normalize and store data drawn from multiple sensors, mobile devices and other data sources (such as blood and genetic data). We provide one simple, structured API for inter
details: Human API can turn disparate health data compiled from dozens of sensors and data sources into a meaningful story of a user’s health, in real time. The HumanAPI is an API platform for all human health data. We aggregate, normalize and store data drawn from multiple sensors, mobile devices and other data sources (such as blood and genetic data). We provide one simple, structured API for interacting with all of this health data, regardless of where it comes from.

name: Magnus Health
summary: The technology team at Magnus Health has developed a robust application programming interface (API) that facilitates interaction between your school’s information system and Magnus Health. Schools that are already using a student information system can take advantage of having a single sign-on (SSO) integration with Magnus Health’s web-based SMR (student medical record).
details: The technology team at Magnus Health has developed a robust application programming interface (API) that facilitates interaction between your school’s information system and Magnus Health. Schools that are already using a student information system can take advantage of having a single sign-on (SSO) integration with Magnus Health’s web-based SMR (student medical record).

name: MedlinePlus
summary: MedlinePlus offers a search-based Web service that provides access to MedlinePlus health topic data in XML format. Using the Web service, software developers can build applications that utilize MedlinePlus health topic information. The service accepts keyword searches as requests and returns relevant health topics in ranked order. Keyword searches may be limited to specific fields. The service als
details: MedlinePlus offers a search-based Web service that provides access to MedlinePlus health topic data in XML format. Using the Web service, software developers can build applications that utilize MedlinePlus health topic information. The service accepts keyword searches as requests and returns relevant health topics in ranked order. Keyword searches may be limited to specific fields. The service also returns health topic summaries, search result snippets, external links, and other associated data.

name: PokitDok
summary: PokitDok Platform (www.pokitdok.com) is delivering the business of health, to developers.  We have gathered the best healthcare data available, and invested heavily in cleaning it, integrating it, and putting it behind a simple API. Now your apps can benefit from our best in class provider data, cash and insurance based pricing, eligibility checks and X12 processing. Sign up today to gain access t
details: PokitDok Platform (www.pokitdok.com) is delivering the business of health, to developers.  We have gathered the best healthcare data available, and invested heavily in cleaning it, integrating it, and putting it behind a simple API. Now your apps can benefit from our best in class provider data, cash and insurance based pricing, eligibility checks and X12 processing. Sign up today to gain access to JSON based API endpoints and EDI support, and real-time activity tracking.

name: Practice Fusion
summary: Practice Fusions Electronic Health Record was developed from the real workflows of office-based physicians. Our free, web-based EHR software is fully-featured enabling you to effectively manage your practice. Use our system to schedule an appointment, complete a medical chart during a visit, send a prescription with our e-prescribing feature and bill for your practice. Our Electronic Health Record
details: Practice Fusions Electronic Health Record was developed from the real workflows of office-based physicians. Our free, web-based EHR software is fully-featured enabling you to effectively manage your practice. Use our system to schedule an appointment, complete a medical chart during a visit, send a prescription with our e-prescribing feature and bill for your practice. Our Electronic Health Record software is so easy to use, you can sign up and start charting immediately.

name: QI Bench
summary: Quantitative imaging applications such as imaging biomarkers advance the utility of medical imaging. They may detect and characterize disease, before, during or after a course of therapy. They may also predict the course of disease, with or without therapy.
details: Quantitative imaging applications such as imaging biomarkers advance the utility of medical imaging. They may detect and characterize disease, before, during or after a course of therapy. They may also predict the course of disease, with or without therapy.

name: The Cancer
summary: CancerAPI.org is the home of CANAPI, a platform for building applications focused on helping users find, follow and share information about emerging innovations in the fight against cancer
details: CancerAPI.org is the home of CANAPI, a platform for building applications focused on helping users find, follow and share information about emerging innovations in the fight against cancer

name: TrueVault
summary: TrueVault is a secure data vault. It is designed from the ground up to provide regulatory compliant storage for Protected Health Information (PHI) and Personally Identifiable Information (PII). TrueVault provides a simple REST API that can be used to store and retrieve any amount of data, at any time, from anywhere on the web. It gives developers the freedom to create applications that require reg
details: TrueVault is a secure data vault. It is designed from the ground up to provide regulatory compliant storage for Protected Health Information (PHI) and Personally Identifiable Information (PII). TrueVault provides a simple REST API that can be used to store and retrieve any amount of data, at any time, from anywhere on the web. It gives developers the freedom to create applications that require regulatory compliance without worrying about regulatory compliance.

name: Validic
summary: Validic collects de-identified patient data from wearables, clinical devices and patient healthcare applications. Validic is a behind the scenes IT infrastructure solution where with one simple RESTful API connection to Validic, you have access to the standardized, secure data you need to accelerate your strategic business initiatives, reduce costs and improve patient outcomes.
details: Validic collects de-identified patient data from wearables, clinical devices and patient healthcare applications. Validic is a behind the scenes IT infrastructure solution where with one simple RESTful API connection to Validic, you have access to the standardized, secure data you need to accelerate your strategic business initiatives, reduce costs and improve patient outcomes.

name: Walgreens
summary: Walgreens (www.walgreens.com) is the nationu2019s largest drugstore chain with fiscal 2010 sales of $67 billion. The company operates 7,689 drugstores in all 50 states, the District of Columbia and Puerto Rico. Each day, Walgreens provides nearly 6 million customers the most convenient, multi-channel access to consumer goods and services and trusted, cost-effective pharmacy, health and wellness se
details: Walgreens (www.walgreens.com) is the nationu2019s largest drugstore chain with fiscal 2010 sales of $67 billion. The company operates 7,689 drugstores in all 50 states, the District of Columbia and Puerto Rico. Each day, Walgreens provides nearly 6 million customers the most convenient, multi-channel access to consumer goods and services and trusted, cost-effective pharmacy, health and wellness services and advice in communities across America.
